author: Steve Clemons
title: The Hill's Coronavirus Report: Seattle Mayor Jenny Durkan says because of testing and tracing deficit, no city or state can safely reopen; Trump to sign executive order on immigration today
description: CDC director says next COVID-19 wave could be much worse | Senate-approved $484 billion relief bill awaits House passage | Trump says US Navy should ‘shoot down and destroy’ any harassing Iranian gunships | It’s Earth Day’s 50th anniversary | Seattle Mayor Je…
content:
